languages.text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the ability user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the ability user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

languages.text: Erzeugt für 1 Runde im Explosionsbereich eine Zone der Furcht von 3×3 Feldern. Zone der Furcht: All Kreaturen in einer 3×3-Zone müssen eine Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder sich sofort aus der Zone bewegen, selbst wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g} sind. Diese Bewegung löst {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} der Verbündeten des Nutzers der Fähigkeit aus, die die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestanden haben oder die sich außerhalb der Zone befinden.
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the ability user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Erzeugt für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} im Explosionsbereich eine Zone der Furcht von 3×3 Feldern. Zone der Furcht: All Kreaturen in einer 3×3-Zone müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen oder sich sofort aus der Zone bewegen, selbst wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g} sind. Diese Bewegung löst {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} der Verbündeten des Nutzers der {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} aus, die die {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} bestanden haben oder die sich außerhalb der Zone befinden.

languages.text: Crée une Zone d'Effroi de 3 × 3 cases dans la zone d'explosion pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone d'Effroi : toutes les créatures présentes dans une zone de 3 × 3 cases doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} ou sortir immédiatement de la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect} immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés de l'utilisateur de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Crée une Zone d'Effroi de 3 × 3 cases dans la zone d'explosion pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone d'Effroi : toutes les créatures présentes dans une zone de 3 × 3 cases doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou sortir immédiatement de la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés de l'utilisateur de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.

Crée une Zone d'Effroi de 3 × 3 cases dans la zone d'explosion pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone d'Effroi : toutes les créatures présentes dans une zone de 3 × 3 cases doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} ou sortir immédiatement de la zone, même si elles sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisées{/g}. Ce déplacement déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} de la part des alliés de l'utilisateur de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} qui ont réussi le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} ou qui se trouvent en dehors de la zone.

languages.text: 在爆炸地点制造一片3×3的恐惧区域，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 恐惧区域：3×3区域内的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败，则会立刻撤出这片区域，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。当敌人移动时，使用者通过意志{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的盟友，或是位于区域外的盟友会进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}。
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: 在爆炸地点制造一片3×3的恐惧区域，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 恐惧区域：3×3区域内的所有生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若检定失败，则会立刻撤出这片区域，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。当敌人移动时，使用者通过意志{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的盟友，或是位于区域外的盟友会进行{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}{/g}。

languages.text: Crea una Zona de miedo de 3×3 en el área de la explosión durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Zona de miedo: todas las criaturas en esta zona de 3×3 deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o moverse inmediatamente para salir de la zona, independientemente de si están {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizadas{/g}. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de los aliados del usuario de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que hayan superado la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} o estén fuera de la zona.
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Crea una Zona de miedo de 3×3 en el área de la explosión durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Zona de miedo: todas las criaturas en esta zona de 3×3 deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o moverse inmediatamente para salir de la zona, independientemente de si están {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidas{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizadas{/g}. Este movimiento provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} de los aliados del usuario de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} que hayan superado la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} o estén fuera de la zona.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、爆発範囲内に3x3の恐怖の一帯を作り出す。 恐怖の一帯：3x3のゾーン内のすべてのクリーチャーは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても即座にゾーンの外へ移動しなければならない。この移動は、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功したか、ゾーンの外側にした{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}使用者の味方による{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、爆発範囲内に3x3の恐怖の一帯を作り出す。 恐怖の一帯：3x3のゾーン内のすべてのクリーチャーは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならず、失敗した場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても即座にゾーンの外へ移動しなければならない。この移動は、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功したか、ゾーンの外側にした{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}使用者の味方による{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発する。

languages.text: Cоздает Область страха размером 3×3 в области взрыва на 1 раунд. Область страха: все существа в области 3×3 выполняют проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил способность, прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} или находящихся вне области страха.
languages.original_text: Creates a 3×3 Zone of Fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in a 3×3 zone must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from the ability user's allies that have passed the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or that are outside the zone.

traits.locale_text: Создает зону страха размером 3×3 в области взрыва на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Зона страха: все существа в зоне 3×3 должны пройти {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}тест на сопротивление силе воли{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}{/g} или немедленно выйти из зоны, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки возможности{/g} со стороны союзников пользователя {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g}, прошедших тест {g|Encyclopedia:Test}{/g} или находящихся вне зоны.

Cоздает Область страха размером 3×3 в области взрыва на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Область страха: все существа в области 3×3 выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} или находящихся вне области страха.

Cоздает Область страха размером 3×3 в области взрыва на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Область страха: все существа в области 3×3 выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала немедленно покидают область, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}. Это движение провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} от союзников того, кто применил {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, прошедших {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} или находящихся вне области страха.
